alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 11 at 11:42PM EDT until July 12 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN OAKLAND COUNTY... At 1142 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Holly, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Ortonville around 1150 PM EDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
